name: the Matrix of TIME
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS IS THE MAC VERSION OF THE GAME.

BE SURE YOU HAVE AT LEAST MAC OS X 10.5.5 BEFORE GETTING THIS GAME.

Use the mouse to control the flashing circle.  The spinning energy ball will always move towards it.  Your goal is to guide the energy ball into the goal.  Be sure that the ball does NOT touch the flashing circle or goes over the edge of the screen.  As you pass each level, you will gain additional instructions. 

Your mind has entered the Matrix of Time.  The Matrix of Time is a device that has made time travel possible.  However, it has been so badly misused and abused.  This has resulted in time traveler bringing unspeakable horror to ages past.  The world is gotten really crappy because of this.  If you can destroy the Matrix of Time by guiding your mind past all of its levels, you will erase all events of time traveling.  This will remove most of all the terrible things that have happened in history, and restore the world.  The question is, can you do it? 

CLICK ON THE "X" shown on the lower right of each screen to quit the game.

GOOD LUCK!
